subject: [Mhln] Creative Suite 3 Premium only $269
body:
Each year one vicious habit discarded, in time might make the worst of us good.

'Tis the last rose of summer, left blooming alone all her lovely companions are faded and gone.

It's pretty hard to be efficient without being obnoxious.

Brain surgeons earn 10 times that of a general practitioner... it pays to be an expert.

There is no gilding of setting sun or glamour of poetry to light up the ferocious and endless toil of the farmers wives.

Contentment consist not in adding more fuel, but in taking away some fire.

Life is short, but there is always time for courtesy.

Roses fall, but the thorns remain.

Moral courage is a more rare commodity than bravery in battle or great intelligence.

Madam, Life's a piece in bloom death goes dogging everywhere: She's the tenant of the room he's the ruffian on the stair.

Whatever is beautiful is beautiful by necessity.

The really important things are said over cocktails and are never done.

Absolute faith corrupts as absolutely as absolute power.
